Uses of Class
fast3d.math.geom.Point

  • Packages that use Point 
    Package Description
    fast3d.math.geom  
    fast3d.renderables  
    fast3d.util.math  

    • Uses of Point in fast3d.math.geom

      Methods in fast3d.math.geom that return Point 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Point Point.clone() 

    • Uses of Point in fast3d.renderables

      Subclasses of Point in fast3d.renderables 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Pixel
      visualized like a 3d-pixel (a point with a width of 1px and a color)
      no matter how far the camera is away, a pixel will always be shaded to the size of one single pixel on the screen
      points/pixels disappear on mathematically correct ray-tracing imaging, because they have no actual width (like when using the DefaultFragmentShader)
      Methods in fast3d.renderables that return Point 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Point Pixel.getPoint() 

    • Uses of Point in fast3d.util.math

      Methods in fast3d.util.math that return Point 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Point RelationshipAnalytics.computeIntersection(Plate plate, Straight straight)
      for a straight INTERSECTING the plate this method computes the point that is on both the straight and the plate
      static Point RelationshipAnalytics.computeIntersection(Straight a, Straight b)
      for INTERSECTING straights this method computes the point that is on both straights
      Methods in fast3d.util.math with parameters of type Point 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Relationship RelationshipAnalytics.analyze(Plate a, Point b)
      a wrapper to analyze(a,b,0.0); with zeroLockControl disabled
      static Relationship RelationshipAnalytics.analyze(Plate plate, Point point, double zeroLockControl)
      compares the position of the point to the plate
      if the point is on the plate result will be intersecting otherwise parallel
      static Relationship RelationshipAnalytics.analyze(Point a, Point b)
      compares the position of the points
      if they are equal result will be identical otherwise parallel
      static Relationship RelationshipAnalytics.analyze(Straight straight, Point point)
      compares the position of the point to the straight
      if the point is on the straight result will be intersecting otherwise parallel
      static double RelationshipAnalytics.computeDistance(Plate a, Point b)
      for a point non-INCIDENT to the plate the distance between the point and the plate is greater than 0 otherwise 0
      the distance between a point and a plate is the distance between the point and its nadir point on the plate
      static double RelationshipAnalytics.computeDistance(Point a, Point b)
      for two non-IDENTICAL points their distance between them is greater than 0, otherwise 0
      static double RelationshipAnalytics.computeDistance(Straight a, Point b)
      for a point non-INCIDENT to the straight the distance between the point and the straight is greater than 0 otherwise 0
      the distance between a point and a straight is the distance between the point and its nadir point on the straight
